--- select_unnest_with_offset_and_alias.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST([1,2,3]) AS value WITH OFFSET AS num

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      61,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  61,
        Expr: &parser.Unnest{
          pos:  18,
          end:  61,
          Expr: &parser.ArrayLit{
            pos:    25,
            end:    32,
            Type:   (*parser.Type)(nil),
            Values: parser.ExprList{
              &parser.IntLit{
                pos:   26,
                end:   27,
                Value: "1",
              },
              &parser.IntLit{
                pos:   28,
                end:   29,
                Value: "2",
              },
              &parser.IntLit{
                pos:   30,
                end:   31,
                Value: "3",
              },
            },
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   &parser.Ident{
            pos:  37,
            end:  42,
            Name: "value",
          },
          WithOffset:   true,
          WithOffsetAs: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  58,
            end:  61,
            Name: "num",
          },
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY[1, 2, 3]) AS value WITH OFFSET num
